data.title: Texas Health And Human Services Commission
data.meta_description: Find Help A search term is required to find resources for food, health, housing, and more Enter Search Term enter search term 211 Administrative Entities 211 Lead Agencies 311 Services 3D Printing 911 Services AARP Tax Aide Program Sites Abandoned Building Inspection Abandoned Shopping Cart Removal Abandoned Vehicle Reporting/Removal Absentee Ballots Abused Adults Abused
data.meta_site_name: 2-1-1 Texas | 2-1-1 Texas - Connecting People and Services
data.text:
Needs: This column refers to what you’re looking for, like Rent Payment Assistance or Food Pantries. It can also describe groups of people services are for, like Older Adults or, if you’re looking for health-related help, a “need” can be the specific illness, like Heart Disease.

Programs: The names of the programs that various organizations offer. You can also the name of the organization if you don’t know the program
